name: Symphony of Delights
description:
Morpheus's daughter stole the keys that open portals between the realms of existence. Faced with the threat of demiurges, she will fight to save the free will of dreamers. She will give herself completely in this quest, completely! With lust and strength!

Features:
- Sprites animations frame by frame.
- Fully hand-drawn. Techniques: Acrylics, watercolors and rough pastels.
- Optional side stories.
- Fun battle system based on wise decisions.
- Nearby checkpoints.
- Different ways.
- Wise decisions.
- No tasks to unlock. Just follow your story. No farming.
- Achievements.
- Filled with lust scenes.
- Simple, easy and intuitive user interface.

Coming soon:
Translations into Chinese, Portuguese, Russian and other languages.
MAC and Linux version.

There are still many mysteries to be revealed!
